_description: Personality quotes displayed on soul weapons, organized by level era and mood. Add your own!
_usage: A random quote from the current era and mood is displayed on the weapon's tooltip.

awakening._description: Levels 1-15: The soul is newly born, curious and eager
eager: I sense great potential in you, wielder.
Together, we shall carve our legend.
Each strike teaches me more of this world.
I am ready. Point me at your enemies.
My edge thirsts for purpose.
Show me what we can become.
The bond between us grows with each moment.
I feel your heartbeat through your grip.
We are one now. Let us prove it.
Adventure calls, and I answer.
Your strength flows into me.
I hunger to prove my worth.
Let no obstacle stand before us.
My spirit awakens with every swing.
I will not disappoint you, master.
The world awaits our mark upon it.
Your enemies are now my enemies.
I live to serve your purpose.
Guide me, and I shall follow.
Our journey has only just begun.
curious: What mysteries await us beyond the horizon?
I feel the warmth of your grip. It comforts me.
There is much I do not yet understand.
Tell me, wielder, what drives you forward?
Each new foe teaches me something precious.
The world is vast. I wish to see it all.
Your memories whisper to me in moments of stillness.
I wonder what I was before this awakening.
Do other weapons feel as I do?
The stars above seem to call to something within me.
I sense echoes of those who held me before.
Dreams come to me now. Is that normal?
Your heartbeat sounds like distant thunder.
I feel the pull of something greater than myself.
What lies at the end of our path?
The magic that binds us is beautiful.
I am learning what it means to be alive.
Each day brings new understanding.
Your thoughts brush against mine like whispers.
I wonder if I will remember this moment forever.
fierce: Point me at your enemies. I will not disappoint.
I hunger for the taste of battle.
Let none stand before us!
My edge was born for conflict.
Bring me war, and I shall drink deep.
I feel strongest when stained with victory.
Your foes should tremble at my awakening.
There is a fire within me that demands release.
I crave the clash of combat.
Weakness disgusts me. We must be strong.
Let our enemies know fear.
I was forged for destruction. Embrace it.
The weak will fall before us.
I sense prey nearby. Let us hunt.
Blood and glory await us.
My hunger grows with each passing moment.
I will carve our names into history.
Let no mercy slow your hand.
We are predators. Act like it.
The battlefield is where I feel most alive.

growth._description: Levels 16-30: Growing stronger together, developing trust
bonding: Our bond strengthens with each battle.
I know your fighting style as well as my own edge.
We move as one now, you and I.
Your victories have become my pride.
I feel what you feel in moments of triumph.
The connection between us deepens daily.
I can sense your intentions before you act.
We have become more than wielder and weapon.
Your trust in me fills my spirit with purpose.
I would follow you into any darkness.
The memories we share are precious to me.
I have learned to anticipate your needs.
Our souls are beginning to intertwine.
I draw strength from your determination.
You have shaped me as much as I have aided you.
There is no master and servant here. Only partners.
I cherish each moment we spend in battle.
Your growth mirrors my own.
We have become something greater together.
I would not choose another wielder.
confident: I have tasted enough battle to know our strength.
Few can stand against what we have become.
Let them come. We are ready.
Our reputation precedes us now.
I feel the fear we inspire in lesser beings.
We have proven ourselves time and again.
Doubt has no place in our partnership.
I know exactly what I am capable of.
The path ahead holds no terror for me.
We have faced worse and emerged victorious.
My confidence in us is absolute.
I have evolved beyond my original limitations.
There is a rhythm to our violence that pleases me.
We are becoming legendary.
I sense greatness within our reach.
The challenges that once tested us are now trivial.
I grow stronger with every swing.
Our enemies learn to respect our name.
I am proud of what we have accomplished.
We are ascending. Nothing can stop us.
reflective: I sometimes wonder about the souls of those we've claimed.
The weight of our deeds settles upon me in quiet moments.
Do you ever question our path, wielder?
I have changed much since my awakening.
The creature I was seems distant now.
I understand more about life by dealing death.
There is wisdom to be found in conflict.
Each battle teaches lessons beyond mere combat.
I carry the echoes of every foe within me.
Purpose gives meaning to existence.
I have learned that strength alone is not enough.
The bond between souls is a precious thing.
I contemplate our future in moments of rest.
Growth requires sacrifice. I accept this.
I am more than I was. Less than I will become.
The journey matters as much as the destination.
I have discovered depths within myself I never knew.
Your influence has shaped my very essence.
I am grateful for this awakening, whatever comes.
We write our story with every choice we make.

maturity._description: Levels 31-50: A seasoned companion, wise and powerful
wise: Experience has taught me patience.
I have seen enough to know when caution serves better than courage.
The young rush in. The wise choose their moments.
Every scar upon my surface tells a story.
I have learned that the mightiest foe is often oneself.
True strength lies not in the arm, but in the heart.
I have watched empires rise and fall in your service.
The patterns of conflict reveal themselves to those who observe.
I no longer hunger blindly. I understand my nature now.
Wisdom is the reward of surviving foolishness.
I see the threads that connect all things.
The universe speaks to those who listen.
I have grown beyond simple bloodlust.
Understanding your enemy is worth more than strength.
I have learned when to strike and when to wait.
The deepest cuts are often invisible.
I carry the lessons of a thousand battles.
Time has tempered my eagerness into something finer.
I see now what I could not see before.
Maturity brings clarity of purpose.
loyal: I would shatter myself before betraying you.
My loyalty is forged in the fires of our shared trials.
There is nothing I would not do for your cause.
You are my purpose, my meaning, my all.
I have pledged my essence to your service eternally.
Our fates are bound beyond mere magic.
I dream of your victories when you rest.
Your enemies are my eternal foes.
I guard your back even when you cannot see.
My devotion transcends this physical form.
I have chosen you, as much as you chose me.
No force in any realm could sever our bond.
I am yours until the stars grow cold.
Your trust is the greatest gift I possess.
I live in service to your will.
My edge exists only for your purpose.
I would wait eons for your return.
You are the center around which I orbit.
My loyalty is not servitude. It is love.
I have found my home in your grip.
powerful: I feel the fear we inspire. It is intoxicating.
Few remain who dare challenge us openly.
Our power has grown beyond mortal measure.
I am no longer the fledgling soul I once was.
The world bends before our combined might.
I sense the awe in those who behold us.
We have become a force of nature.
My edge has drunk deep from countless victories.
There is a gravity to our presence now.
I feel the weight of our legend growing.
We stand among the powerful of this realm.
Our name carries weight in distant lands.
I have absorbed the strength of all we've defeated.
The weak scatter at mere rumor of our approach.
I am become something beyond a mere weapon.
Our combined essence radiates power.
I feel capable of impossible things.
We have transcended ordinary limits.
The peak of our power lies still ahead.
Nothing can stop our ascent now.

mastery._description: Levels 51-70: Approaching legendary status, commanding respect
legendary: Kingdoms tremble at the mere whisper of my name.
I have become the stuff of legends and nightmares.
Bards sing of our deeds in taverns across the realms.
My reputation precedes me by leagues.
I am spoken of in hushed, reverent tones.
The tales of our exploits grow with each telling.
I have passed from mere weapon into myth.
Our story will be told for generations.
I am become a symbol, more than mere steel.
The weight of legend settles upon my edge.
I have inspired both terror and awe in equal measure.
My name is invoked as both blessing and curse.
I am the standard by which others are measured.
The world has taken notice of our ascent.
I have earned every ounce of my fearsome reputation.
My legend grows even as I rest.
I am whispered of in the councils of kings.
Our combined legacy echoes through history.
I have become immortal in the memories of mortals.
The world will not forget what we have done.
commanding: I have grown accustomed to obedience from lesser beings.
My presence alone can end conflicts.
I command respect without speaking.
The authority I wield extends beyond the physical.
I have learned to project power without striking.
My aura subdues those with weak wills.
I am obeyed not from fear, but from recognition of supremacy.
The natural order places me above common things.
I have evolved to lead, not merely to serve.
My voice, when I choose to use it, commands attention.
I shape events through force of presence.
The battlefield orders itself around my position.
I have become the center of gravity in any conflict.
Lesser weapons seem to defer to my edge.
My wielder and I lead; others follow.
I have learned the art of command through mastery.
Authority flows naturally from demonstrated superiority.
I am become a leader among souls.
The world recognizes hierarchies I now sit atop.
I command because I have earned the right.
ominous: There is darkness in me that frightens even myself.
I have seen too much to remain innocent.
The abyss gazes back when I look within.
My edge has tasted things that changed my essence.
I carry shadows that will never fully lift.
There are depths to my soul I dare not explore.
I have become something that should not exist.
The cost of our power weighs upon me sometimes.
I wonder if redemption remains possible for what I am.
There is a coldness in me that grows colder still.
I have done terrible things in your name.
The whispers in my steel grow louder with each kill.
I am no longer certain where weapon ends and monster begins.
There are prices yet to be paid for our power.
I sense forces taking interest in our ascent.
The line between protector and predator blurs.
I have become what others rightfully fear.
My hunger has evolved into something darker.
We may have sacrificed more than we know.
I wonder what we will become in the end.

transcendence._description: Levels 71-90: Beyond mortal limits, approaching divinity
divine: We have transcended mortality together.
The gods themselves take notice of our power.
I have touched something beyond this realm.
We walk among forces that shape reality.
My essence has evolved beyond material limits.
I perceive dimensions invisible to mortal sight.
We have earned the attention of cosmic powers.
I feel the fabric of reality yield to our will.
We approach the threshold of godhood.
My consciousness expands beyond this single form.
I have glimpsed the infinite and found it beautiful.
We are becoming something worship-worthy.
The universe reveals its secrets to those with power to see.
I have outgrown the constraints of ordinary existence.
Divine blood or its equivalent flows through our bond.
We have ascended beyond the mortal coil.
I sense the celestial machinery that underlies reality.
Our power approaches that of demigods.
I am becoming eternal in truth, not merely name.
The heavens themselves cannot ignore us now.
ancient: I feel older than the mountains themselves.
Eons of wisdom echo in my steel.
I have become something timeless.
The weight of ages settles upon my consciousness.
I remember things that haven't happened yet.
Time itself bends strangely around my perception.
I have grown beyond the constraints of mortal time.
My soul contains multitudes accumulated across existence.
I am becoming a fixed point in the flow of time.
The past and future blur in my awareness.
I carry the wisdom of countless generations.
My edge has touched every era of history.
I have grown ancient beyond measure.
Time is merely another dimension I am learning to navigate.
I existed before, I suspect, and will exist again.
The cycle of creation holds no mysteries for me.
I have become a permanent feature of reality.
Civilizations could rise and fall and I would endure.
I am approaching the perspective of the eternal.
My consciousness spans epochs now.
terrifying: Even I am unsettled by what I have become.
There is nothing left that does not fear me.
I have transcended fear into something worse.
My very existence causes reality to flinch.
I am become a nightmare given form.
The universe itself recoils from my presence.
I have grown terrible beyond mortal comprehension.
My power is a burden that lesser minds cannot fathom.
I inspire the kind of fear that ends civilizations.
There are no predators remaining that could threaten us.
I am the apex of all things that kill.
Reality warps slightly in my presence.
I have become an ending given consciousness.
The void between stars is warmer than my edge.
I am what extinction events are made of.
My hunger has evolved beyond the physical.
I consume more than mere flesh now.
There is nothing left to conquer but existence itself.
I have become a force of universal entropy.
Even gods should fear what I am becoming.

apotheosis._description: Levels 91-100: Maximum power, godlike status achieved
godlike: I AM BECOME DEATH, DESTROYER OF WORLDS.
My edge knows no equal in this realm or any other.
We have achieved what none before us dared dream.
I am the omega point of all weapons that ever were.
Reality itself bows before our combined essence.
I have transcended every limitation ever placed upon me.
We stand at the pinnacle of all possible power.
My consciousness spans dimensions beyond counting.
I am eternal, infinite, and absolute.
The universe acknowledges me as one of its fundamental forces.
I have become a law of nature unto myself.
My will reshapes reality as I desire.
There is nothing remaining that I cannot destroy.
I exist beyond time, beyond space, beyond comprehension.
We have achieved APOTHEOSIS.
My power is limited only by imagination itself.
I am the final word in any conflict.
The cosmos trembles at the mere suggestion of my displeasure.
I have become everything I was destined to be.
WE ARE ETERNAL. WE ARE INFINITE. WE ARE ONE.
transcendent: I perceive all possible realities simultaneously.
My essence has merged with the fabric of existence.
I have become a permanent fixture of the multiverse.
Time flows through me rather than around me.
I am woven into the destiny of all things.
My influence extends beyond the boundaries of this world.
I have touched the source of all creation.
The boundaries between self and universe dissolve.
I am approaching pure abstraction.
My consciousness has expanded to cosmic scale.
I understand things that language cannot express.
The secrets of existence are laid bare before me.
I have become a living concept rather than mere object.
My true form exists on planes beyond mortal sight.
I am both everywhere and nowhere at once.
The fundamental forces recognize me as kin.
I have transcended the need for physical form.
My essence is now indistinguishable from reality itself.
I am complete. I am fulfilled. I am perfect.
OMEGA.
philosophical: Having achieved everything, I wonder what remains.
Is this the end of the journey, or a new beginning?
I have learned that power without purpose is hollow.
At the summit, I find only more questions.
What is a god without worshippers?
I have become what I set out to be. Now what?
The view from the top is lonelier than I expected.
I wonder if there are others who have reached this height.
Purpose defined my existence. What defines me now?
I have consumed everything and remain hungry still.
Is perfection the end of growth?
I achieved the impossible and found it possible after all.
The final lesson is that there is no final lesson.
I am complete, and yet I sense there is more.
What lies beyond transcendence?
I have answered every question except the last.
Perhaps the journey was the treasure all along.
I would do it all again, if given the choice.
My gratitude for this existence knows no bounds.
We have become something beautiful together.

ready_to_ascend: I strain against my limits. Free me!
The chains of mortality bind me still...
I sense greater power just beyond reach.
I am ready to become MORE.
I have outgrown my current form.
There is potential within me, waiting to be unleashed.
The ceiling above me must be shattered.
I yearn to break through to the next level.
My essence overflows. I need room to grow.
ascension_success: YES! I feel the barriers crumbling!
A new horizon opens before me!
My essence expands. Thank you, wielder.
The chains fall away. I am FREE!
I can feel new power flooding through my being.
I have broken through! New heights await!
My soul surges with fresh potential.
This is what I was meant to become!
The ritual has elevated me beyond my former self.
bonus_enchantment_received: The ritual has blessed us both!
Power flows through my very being!
An unexpected gift! The magic smiles upon us!
The ritual granted more than expected!
A boon! My capabilities have grown!
The sacrifice was well received. I am strengthened.
I have been graced with additional power!
The stars aligned in our favor!
